slide-content-work.title: We are the engine behind behind every solution
slide-content-work.description: Every solution, result and success achieved is possible thanks to our team. We transform challenges into cutting-edge technological solutions.

slide-content-services.title: Technological innovation
slide-content-services.description: We manage each stage of software development, ensuring solutions tailored to the needs of your business.

slide-content-history.title: Global presence
slide-content-history.description: More than 9 countries rely on our technological technological expertise.

slide-content-contact.title: We simplify your management
slide-content-contact.description: With integrated solutions and specialized teams, we boost your productivity, ensuring efficiency, quality and results aligned with your objectives.

our-services.description-outsourcing: We provide trained personnel and customized solutions to improve the efficiency and productivity of your business.
our-services.description-delivery-center: We offer an integral management of technological projects, covering all stages of software development, from conception to maintenance.

who-we-are.title: Who we are
who-we-are.description: We are a company specialized in Technology, created in 2015, based in Argentina and abroad.We are leaders in Technology Services and IT Recruiting.We accompany our clients to provide them with digital solutions.Our goal is to be the technological partner of our clients.

delivery-center.delivery-center-description: Gestionamos proyectos de desarrollo de software, brindando soluciones tecnológicas y diseño de productos digitales con profesionales de experiencia, utilizando metodologías ágiles o tradicionales.
delivery-center.innovation-hub-description: Our Innovation Hub is a space where innovative ideas take shape in a collaborative and technological environment.
delivery-center.architectural-design-description: We have a strong team of architects who can design the system structure, make decisions about appropriate technologies and tools, and ensure the integrity and performance of the software.
delivery-center.software-development-description: We have a strong capability to develop quality software with teams experienced in various programming languages, frameworks and methodologies.
delivery-center.maintenance-and-support-description: We perform maintenance and corrective/evolutionary support services, working on updates, patches and bug fixes to existing software.
delivery-center.project-management-description: We have a solid capacity to develop quality software with experienced teams in various programming languages and methodologies.
delivery-center.ia-data-description: We have a team that can address and execute services to become a Data Driven organization.
delivery-center.rpa-robotization-description: We automate repetitive and manual tasks through robot software, optimizing operational efficiency.
delivery-center.cloud-computing-description: We provide solutions in the Cloud, whether they are developments or building infrastructures from scratch.
delivery-center.office-pmo-description: We advise our clients in setting up PMO offices based on market methodologies, adapting them to the needs and demand generation of the business.
delivery-center.quality-assurance-description: Our teams have QA and QC processes where robust tests are defined. We provide consulting on quality processes based on TMMI.
delivery-center.ux: UX Reasearch Design Thinking Workshops Usability Testing Heuristic Analysis A/B Testing Interaction Design.

outsourcing.outsourcing-description: Designed to provide companies with an efficient and specialized solution in the recruitment and selection of human talent.
outsourcing.services-subtitle-description: Each selection process is based on a thorough evaluation of the candidates' skills and capabilities, ensuring that their profile is suitable for the positions available.
outsourcing.our-methodology-description: Our methodology ensures high efficiency at each stage of the process, respecting the highest standards of safety and quality in human resources management.
outsourcing.how-we-work-description: Rely on our experience to optimize your recruitment process and ensure that the right talent is part of your team.
outsourcing.talent-search-and-selection-description: We connect companies with the ideal talent Our search and selection service is designed to identify, evaluate and attract the professionals that best align with the needs and objectives of your organization.
outsourcing.we-analyze: We analyze the profile of each position to design customized recruitment processes.
outsourcing.talent-title: Access to a Broad Talent Network
outsourcing.talent-description: We have a carefully selected candidate base with experience in multiple industries.
outsourcing.comprehensive-evaluation-description: Rely on our experience to optimize your recruitment process and ensure that the right talent is part of your team.
outsourcing.benefits-item1: Time reduction in the recruitment process
outsourcing.benefits-item2: Guaranteed talent aligned with your company's values and objectives.
outsourcing.benefits-item3: A strategic partner for the growth of your team

our-history.our-history-description: Somos una empresa especializada en Tecnología, creada en 2015, con sede en Argentina y en el exterior.Somos Líderes en Servicios Tecnológicos y Recruiting en IT. Acompañamos a nuestros clientes para brindarles soluciones digitales.Nuestro objetivo es ser el partner tecnológico de nuestros clientes.
our-history.our-history-item1-description: CFOTech IT Global Services is born, marking the beginning of our history in the technology sector.
our-history.our-history-item2-description: Move to World Trade Center (WTC): A new space that boosted our collaboration and growth.
our-history.our-history-item3-description: Moving to the Technology District: We moved into an ideal environment to enhance our mission of technological leadership.
our-history.our-history-item4-description: 200 employees: We reached a new milestone in building a committed and professional team.
our-history.our-history-item5-description: Move to the HIT Building: New offices designed for the future. Regionalization: We expand our presence in Latin America. +530 collaborators: A team that keeps growing, bringing innovation to every corner.
our-history.mission-description: To drive the digital transformation of companies, providing innovative solutions and skilled talent that contribute to the growth and success of our clients.
our-history.vision-description: To be leaders in technological innovation, positively impacting each organization with which we collaborate through teamwork, promoting respect and diversity, being recognized as the ideal strategic partner for digital success.
our-history.values-item1-description: We research and develop solutions to be at the forefront of technology.
our-history.values-item2-description: We foster collaboration to solve problems and create impactful solutions.
our-history.values-item3-description: We promote an environment where everyone feels valued and respected.
our-history.values-item4-description: We act with integrity, sincerity and transparency in all our actions.
our-history.values-item5-description: We adjust quickly to market changes and new technologies.
